narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Motivational Services INC is a Voluntary or Charitable provider based in Augusta, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $92.1M in Medicaid payments across 356K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $92.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
